location.question: Where are you located?
location.answer: We are based in Albany, NY, proudly serving the entire Capital Region.

hours.question: What are your business hours?
hours.answer:
Monday to Friday: 8:00 AM - 8:00 PM
Saturday and Sunday: 9:00 AM - 6:00 PM

cakeTypes.question: What types of cakes do you make?
cakeTypes.answer: We offer a wide variety of flavors including vanilla, chocolate, red velvet, carrot, lemon, marble, and more. We're always happy to discuss custom flavors to match your preferences.

fillings.question: What cake fillings do you offer?
fillings.answer:
Our extensive selection includes:
• Chocolate ganache
• Vanilla
• Dulce de Leche
• Crema pastelera
• Guava
• Strawberry
• Peach
• Chocolate fudge
• Pineapple
• Nutella
• Fruit cocktail
• Crema de Almendra

frosting.question: What types of frosting do you use?
frosting.answer:
We specialize in:
• American buttercream
• Sweet meringue
• Italian frosting
• Chantilly cream

appointment.question: Do you work by appointment only?
appointment.answer: Yes, we operate on an appointment-only basis. A minimum of three days' notice is required for all orders.

readyToGo.question: Do you sell ready-to-go items?
readyToGo.answer: Currently, we do not offer ready-to-go items. All our cakes are made to order.

storefront.question: Do you operate from a storefront?
storefront.answer: We operate as a home-based bakery, creating all our custom cakes from our licensed home kitchen.

payment.question: What payment methods do you accept?
payment.answer:
We accept:
• Zelle
• Cash App
• Cash
• Credit/Debit Cards
Please note that some payment methods may incur additional processing fees.

deposit.question: Is a deposit required?
deposit.answer: Yes, a 50% deposit is required to secure your order. The remaining balance is due upon receipt of your order.

delivery.question: Do you offer delivery?
delivery.answer: Delivery is available through independent drivers. The delivery fee is calculated at $1 per minute of travel time (e.g., 5 minutes = $5, 20 minutes = $20). We encourage customers to pick up their orders, as we cannot be responsible for any loss or damage that occurs during delivery.
